round_best: Develop a generative adversarial network (GAN) specifically tailored for 3D model synthesis that incorporates a style transfer mechanism. This network would learn stylistic elements from a database of high-quality 3D models and apply these styles to basic structural forms generated from user specifications or random seeds. By enabling style customization in the generative process, the system ensures higher quality and distinctive design outcomes, enhancing both the creative capabilities and controllability for designers.
